# Documentation

This documentation site for Research Hub Dataset Manager is powered by VuePress, the Vue-powered Static Site Generator.

NOTE

This page only provides a high-level description of the documentation site. To investigate the code in detail, go to the project's GitHub repository or clone the repository to your local workstation.

Also, please refer to the VuePress documentation for more general information on VuePress.

# Project setup

# install VuePress globally
yarn global add vuepress
# OR npm install -g vuepress

# start dev server
vuepress dev docs

# build to static files
vuepress build docs

# File structure

/docs/
├─ .vuepress/
|   ├─ components/
|   ├─ public/
|   |   └─ assets/
|   ├─ styles/
|   └─ config.js
├─ dev-guide/
├─ guide/
├─ deploy.sh
└─ README.md
  • /docs/.vuepress/ includes custom Vue components (components/), static assets (public/assets/), style files (styles/) and config.js for specifying configurations.
  • /docs/dev-guide/ includes all markdown files corresponding to the Developer Guide pages.
  • /docs/guide/ includes all markdown files corresponding to the Guide pages.
  • deploy.sh is a shell script to build and deploy this documentation to GitHub Pages.
  • /docs/REAMDE.md is a markdown file for the documentation homepage.
